langs.economy_text: The room is equipped with two single beds, a seating area, a work desk, a wardrobe, IP TV, a spacious shower cabin, a minibar, an electronic safe, and tea-making facilities. The room comes with bathrobes, slippers, toiletries, and a hairdryer.
langs.pol_lux_text: The room is equipped with two single beds or one double bed with panoramic windows and a mountain view, a seating area, a work desk, a wardrobe, IP TV, a spacious shower cabin, a minibar, an electronic safe, and tea-making facilities. The room comes with bathrobes, slippers, toiletries, and a hairdryer.
langs.lux_text: The room is equipped with two single beds or one double bed with panoramic windows and a mountain view, a seating area, a work desk, a wardrobe, IP TV, a spacious shower cabin, a minibar, an electronic safe, and tea-making facilities. It also includes a private balcony with a beautiful view. The room comes with bathrobes, slippers, toiletries, and a hairdryer.
langs.triple_room_text: The room is equipped with one double bed and one single bed with panoramic windows and a mountain view, a seating area, a work desk, a wardrobe, IP TV, a spacious shower cabin, a minibar, an electronic safe, and tea-making facilities. The room comes with bathrobes, slippers, toiletries, and a hairdryer.
langs.standard_text: The standard twin or double room offers everything needed for a comfortable stay. The room is equipped with two single beds or one double bed, a seating area, a work desk, a wardrobe, IP TV, a spacious shower room, a minibar, an electronic safe, and tea-making facilities. The room comes with bathrobes, slippers, toiletries, and a hairdryer. Each room has wireless internet (Wi-Fi).
langs.about_text:
Welcome to Royal Gardens, a family resort located in the picturesque Bostanlyk district, just 65 km from the city. Our hotel offers comfortable accommodation in 18 rooms and 8 cottages, with the capacity to host up to 90 guests.


We pride ourselves on the diversity of our services and leisure opportunities: five categories of modern rooms, indoor and outdoor pools with jacuzzis and breathtaking panoramic mountain views, two restaurants, an eco-farm with horse and camel rides.


For guest relaxation, we offer a Turkish hammam, Japanese sauna, salt cave, and Finnish sauna. For active recreation, we provide a football field, gym, and both indoor and outdoor playgrounds for children. Adventure lovers can enjoy zip line rides and roller coasters.


We also have a massage room, conference hall, and spacious parking for your convenience.
